title: How to Make Rose and Lavender Tea

steps.headline: Warm the teapot.
steps.description: Slosh hot water in inside it, then tip it out.

steps.headline: Add the rose petals and lavender flowers to the teapot.
Pour the boiling water over the the flowers and petals.
Leave the tea to steep for 5 minutes.
Pour the tea.
steps.description: Strain it to remove the petals and flowers.

text: Warm the teapot. Slosh hot water in inside it, then tip it out. Add the rose petals and lavender flowers to the teapot.  Pour the boiling water over the the flowers and petals.  Leave the tea to steep for 5 minutes.  Pour the tea. Strain it to remove the petals and flowers. Sweeten to taste.  Finished.
